title: Returning a Faulty Product to a Store

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to return a broken item to a store. This is a common situation where knowing a few key phrases can be very helpful!

data.tip: The 'au' sound in German is like the 'ow' in the English word 'cow'.

content.title: Explaining the Problem
content.setting: You're in an electronics store with your broken coffee machine and you approach an employee.

conversation_flow.title: Get the employee's attention and say you have a question
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Guten Tag. Kann ich Ihnen helfen?

conversation_flow.title: Explain what you bought here, and when
State what is wrong with the coffee machine
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Eine Kaffeemaschine von letzter Woche... okay. Und?

content.text: Great start! Now you need to propose a solution. Let's learn the words for that.
Nouns in German have a gender. `der` is the article for masculine nouns, like 'der Bon'.

data.tip: The 'ö' sound doesn't exist in English. Try to say 'eh' while rounding your lips like you're saying 'oo'.

content.title: Proposing a Solution
content.setting: The employee understands the machine is broken and is waiting for your next step.

conversation_flow.title: Show them the receipt
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ach so, die Kaffeemaschine ist kaputt. Haben Sie den Bon?

conversation_flow.title: Say you would like a new one
Suggest getting your money back as an alternative

content.text: Excellent! The employee is checking what they can do. Let's learn how to wrap up the conversation.
Remember `die Kaffeemaschine`? `die` is the article for feminine nouns, like 'die Hilfe'.

content.title: Resolving the Issue
content.setting: The employee comes back from the stockroom with a solution for you.

conversation_flow.title: Respond positively to the proposed solution
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Einen Moment... So. Wir haben eine neue Kaffeemaschine für Sie. Hier bitte.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm that everything is sorted out
Thank the employee for their help and say goodbye
